metadata.title: CVE-2014-9645 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The add_probe function in modutils/modprobe.c in BusyBox before 1.23.0 allows local users to bypass intended restrictions on loading kernel modules via a / (slash) character in a module name, as demonstrated by an "ifconfig /usbserial up" command or a "mount -t /snd_pcm none /" command.

criterions.comment: busybox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.22.0-15ubuntu1').
